ordered_dict.py:
  From http://code.activestate.com/recipes/576693/

virtualenv.py:
  Version 1.7
  Downloaded from https://raw.github.com/pypa/virtualenv/master/virtualenv.py

distribute-0.6.28.tar.gz:
  http://pypi.python.org/packages/source/d/distribute/distribute-0.6.28.tar.gz
  Note: the distribute version should match what is required in virtualenv.py (DISTRIBUTE_SETUP_PY),
        you need to update these files (distribute and virtualenv) at the same time.

pip-1.1.tar.gz:
  http://pypi.python.org/packages/source/p/pip/pip-1.1.tar.gz#md5=62a9f08dd5dc69d76734568a6c040508
